section.name: Project Layout
section.p: This contains the JCR Reference Implementation subproject.

The directories contained:
DirectoryDescription
target/classes The destination for the compiled Java classes
src/main/java The directory containing Java source files
target/generated-src/main/java The directory containing generated Java source files
src/test/java
The directory containing JUnit test cases.
src/main/config The directory with sample configuration files etc.
src/main/javacc
The directory with JavaCC grammar files for the XPath and SQL query languages.
target/generated-src/main/javacc The directory containing generated JavaCC grammar files
applications/test
The directory containing the test repository used by the unit tests.
src/site
The directory containing documentation files shown on the Maven-generated Jackrabbit web site.
